name: Graveyard Smash: a monster party trpg
name_original: Graveyard Smash: a monster party trpg
description:
Dr Fricklestone’s throwing the party of the century, and you’re… not invited. But to hell with him. You’re going and gonna have the best time of your life! Unlife? Whatever.

Graveyard Smash is a one-page hack of Grant Howitt's Goat Crashers inspired by Monster Mash. You play a crew of monsters, sneaking into a party you were not invited to.
